Oh man, so many variables! Clarifying statements and questions on the above:
1. I will cook a breakfast just for my partner as often, (if not more so), as cooking for the both of us. I like cooking breakfast, but don't always feel like eating until 10 or 11a.
2. My partner will also often bake things on the weekend to serve as breakfast supplements during the week days; Apple cake, muffins, home-made granola, etc. Not sure if this counts
3.Do smoothies count as cooking? They definitely take a respectable amount of work and make some dishes.
4. How about breakfasts with one quick component and one cooked element? For example, half a grapefruit as-is, plus a vegetarian sausage patty that is cooked?
